schwaebische.de.113476.1: Biker reacts lightning fast and prevents worse
schwaebische.de.113476.2: On Friday evening, a traffic accident occurred on the country road between Machtolsheim and Merklingen, in which a motorcyclist was only slightly injured thanks to his quick reaction.
schwaebische.de.113476.4: A 44-year-old driver wanted to turn left onto Landesstraße 1230 in the direction of Machtolsheim with her VW from Merklingen at around 9.30 pm.
schwaebische.de.113476.5: She overlooked the 24 year old motorcycle driver coming from the direction of Nellingen.
schwaebische.de.113476.6: Hand and foot brake levers fly away in the collision
schwaebische.de.113476.7: The biker still tried to avoid the car, but still touched it at the rear of the vehicle.
schwaebische.de.113476.8: Due to the grazing process, the hand and foot brake levers on the Suzuki were torn off and the driver was no longer able to brake.
schwaebische.de.113476.9: Mindfully, he steered his motorcycle in the green stiffeners next to the road and let it roll out there without falling.
schwaebische.de.113476.11: However, due to the collision with the car, the biker suffered an injury and had to be treated in a clinic.
np-coburg.de.105627.1: Mamming: Corona mass infection: 174 harvesters infected
np-coburg.de.105627.2: After a mass coronavirus infection on a large vegetable farm in Mamming, Lower Bavaria, almost 500 people are under quarantine and are no longer allowed to leave the farm.
np-coburg.de.105627.3: A security service monitors the ban on going out.
np-coburg.de.105627.4: A total of 174 harvest workers were tested positive for the Sars-CoV-2 coronavirus during the series investigation, as the Dingolfing-Landau district office announced on Saturday evening.
np-coburg.de.105627.5: "In order to avoid further expansion, we unfortunately have to take this step to protect the population," explained District Administrator Werner Bumeder (CSU).
np-coburg.de.105627.6: Previously, seven employees had already become infected in the company - this was the reason for the series test.
np-coburg.de.105627.7: The farm is a large vegetable farm, which grows strawberries, cucumbers, cabbage and beetroot - but the cucumbers only for inlay glasses.
np-coburg.de.105627.8: Mamming is a rural community with about 3300 inhabitants not far from Dingolfing with its large BMW plant.
np-coburg.de.105627.9: Bumeder appealed to the citizens to keep calm: "According to our information, this is a closed circle of people."
np-coburg.de.105627.10: On the farm, infected people were separated from non-infected employees, and the site is now surrounded by a barrier fence.
np-coburg.de.105627.11: The Greens and SPD gave the state government co-responsibility.
np-coburg.de.105627.12: The two opposition factions accused Prime Minister Markus Söder (CSU) and his cabinet of neglecting to control the accommodation of seasonal workers.
np-coburg.de.105627.13: "This can be a bitter revenge if such local infection events take place and regional lockdowns have to be ordered," said Jürgen Mistol, the parliamentary managing director of the Greens.
np-coburg.de.105627.14: The SPD takes a similar view: "After the coronavirus outbreak in the Wiesenhof slaughterhouse in mid-May, we have already called for a special control programme for farms with harvest helpers," said environmental expert Florian von Brunn.
np-coburg.de.105627.15: "In our view, the hygiene conditions at the workplace and the living conditions in particular must be strictly controlled.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.1: Aidenbachstraße underground station: Dangerous dispute: 19-year-old falls into the track bed after Schubser
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.2: In a dispute between two youth groups at Aidenbachstraße underground station, a 19-year-old fell through a pusher and slipped into the track bed.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.3: Obersendling - On Friday there was a dispute between two youth groups at the Aidenbachstraße underground station at around 4.15 pm.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.4: A passer-by alerted the police, who arrived with several stripes.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.5: According to initial investigations, a Munich resident (17) pushed a 19-year-old to the ground.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.6: The young man slid over the platform edge and fell into the track bed.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.7: People from the 17-year-old's group helped the victim to climb out of the track.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.8: There was no danger from an incoming train.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.9: According to the police, there were again clashes between the two people.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.10: The 17-year-old initially fled the scene, but his personal details could be determined afterwards.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.11: Accompanied by his father, he went to the police inspection 29.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.12: The 17-year-old is being investigated for assault.
landeszeitung.de.13223.1: Report: Seehofer pushes for longer data retention
landeszeitung.de.13223.3: According to a media report, however, Federal Minister of the Interior Horst Seehofer is calling for an extension of the storage period.
landeszeitung.de.13223.4: He wants to strengthen the fight against child abuse.
landeszeitung.de.13223.5: According to a media report, Federal Minister of the Interior Horst Seehofer (CSU) is calling for extended data retention - instead of the planned ten weeks, half a year.
landeszeitung.de.13223.6: As the "Bild am Sonntag" reports, Seehofer asked Justice Minister Christine Lambrecht (SPD) in a letter for a quick change in the law.
landeszeitung.de.13223.7: Seehofer therefore wants to strengthen the measures against child abuse.
landeszeitung.de.13223.8: He believes it makes sense to "make urgently needed adjustments to the law already now," the newspaper quotes from the letter.
landeszeitung.de.13223.10: A decision of the ECJ is expected.
landeszeitung.de.13223.11: Seehofer, however, wants the changes beforehand so that they can be applied immediately after a possible positive judgment, the report continues.
landeszeitung.de.13223.12: A spokesman for the Ministry of Justice told the newspaper that it could only be meaningfully examined whether legal adjustments were necessary once the courts had decided.
landeszeitung.de.13223.13: In the fight against child abuse and child pornography, Seehofer, together with the interior ministers of the federal states, had already advocated data retention in June.
bild.255016.1: NBA: Strip club trouble for Clippers star Lou Williams
bild.255016.3: Lou Williams (33), basketball pro for the Los Angeles Clippers, is said to have left the tournament quarters at Disney World in Orlando/Florida with permission for a funeral.
bild.255016.4: According to US media reports, he still visited the strip club "Magic City" in Atlanta in the evening.
bild.255016.5: Williams, who is said to have admitted the visit according to ESPN, is back in Isloation, being tested daily for COVID-19.
bild.255016.6: His reason for visiting: Chicken Wings.
bild.255016.7: In February last year, "Sweet Lou", as he is called in the NBA, has already expressed his love for exactly these Wings.
bild.255016.8: The American wrote: "Magic City and Blue Flame (another strip club in Atlanta) have the best wings in town."
bild.255016.9: NBA insider Shams Charania announced on Twitter on Sunday that the NBA has imposed a ten-day quarantine on Williams.
bild.255016.10: The Clippers star thus misses the first two official games after the test match phase.
bild.255016.11: The NBA wants to play the corona season at Disney World.
bild.255016.12: Currently, the top 22 teams are preparing for the season finale, which starts on Friday night.
np-coburg.de.105625.1: Söder comments on coronavirus situation after mass infection
np-coburg.de.105625.2: Munich - Health Minister Melanie Huml (CSU) has already announced a test offensive for large farms on Sunday.
np-coburg.de.105625.3: The press conference will be shown live on our homepage.
np-coburg.de.105625.4: The case in Mamming in the district of Dingolfing-Landau has alarmed authorities and politicians.
np-coburg.de.105625.5: Almost 500 harvest workers from several countries are currently working on the large vegetable farm, and more than a third have become infected with the coronavirus.
np-coburg.de.105625.6: The farm is now under quarantine and is closed off with a construction fence.
np-coburg.de.105625.7: Nobody is allowed to leave the premises, food is delivered.
np-coburg.de.105625.8: The authorities are now offering free coronavirus tests to the more than 3,300 residents of the municipality.
np-coburg.de.105625.9: Since the harvest workers had little contact with the local population, the district office assumes that the infections have not spread beyond the farm.
kurier.at.204625.1: "Conscience bites": confession of the alleged arsonist of Nantes
kurier.at.204625.2: "My client has been cooperative," lawyer Quentin Chabert told the newspaper.
kurier.at.204625.3: The defense attorney added, "He very much regrets the deeds, the confession was a liberation for him."
kurier.at.204625.4: His mandate was "plagued by remorse and greatly affected by the extent of the destruction."
kurier.at.204625.5: If convicted, the man faces ten years in prison and a fine of 150,000 euros, according to prosecutors.
kurier.at.204625.6: The Gothic Saint Peter and Paul Cathedral in Nantes was severely damaged in a fire during the night on Saturday last week.
kurier.at.204625.7: The fire had broken out in three distant places in the church.
kurier.at.204625.8: Laboratory tests confirmed the suspicion of arson.
kurier.at.204625.9: The now detained suspect had already been arrested a few hours after the fire.
kurier.at.204625.10: He was released after a day.
kurier.at.204625.11: The man works as a volunteer for the diocese of Nantes and was responsible for the closure of the cathedral on the eve of the fire.
kurier.at.204625.12: Since there was no trace of a violent intrusion into the church, he quickly came into the eyes of the investigators.
infranken.de.309597.1: Discussing the abolition of the 50+1 rule
infranken.de.309597.2: Former DFB President Reinhard Grindel has recommended thinking about abolishing the 50+1 rule.
infranken.de.309597.3: "German football should at least discuss setting conditions and clear rules for investors before the EU Commission creates a fait accompli," Grindel told Bild am Sonntag.
infranken.de.309597.4: He stressed: "For the clubs that are most likely to become dangerous for Bayern and Dortmund, the 50+1 rules do not work anyway: see Leipzig or Leverkusen.
infranken.de.309597.5: In this respect, there is no getting around the debate as to whether it is not necessary to make it easier for associations that want to break into this phalanx to involve investors."
infranken.de.309597.6: However, he has doubts whether there is a willingness in the German Football League to allow majority participation, which is prohibited in the Bundesliga by the 50+1 rule.
infranken.de.309597.7: "It remains a legal risk to draw investment fences around the business location Bundesliga in a European single market," said Grindel.
infranken.de.309597.8: The former DFB boss sees the danger that "attempts to ensure more competitive balance in the Bundesliga will only weaken the competitiveness of our top clubs at European level, but will not lead to more excitement in the championship."
infranken.de.309597.9: Even an equal distribution of TV money will not have a decisive effect.
infranken.de.309597.10: "FC Bayern has a turnover of 750 million euros, Borussia Dortmund 500 million and RB Leipzig 300 million.
infranken.de.309597.11: The differences are therefore already immense among the first three clubs alone.
infranken.de.309597.12: The other 15 clubs have an average budget of 130 million," explained the 58-year-old.
infranken.de.309597.13: Looking at the past, Grindel feels betrayed.
infranken.de.309597.14: "Unfortunately, there have been people who have noticed this mistake and pierced the press instead of talking to me about it," Grindel said of the acceptance of an expensive watch that led to his resignation in April 2019.
infranken.de.309597.15: "That has already occupied me very much in human terms."
infranken.de.309597.16: He had received the gift, worth around 11,000 euros, from a Ukrainian official.
infranken.de.309597.17: "I committed a compliance violation, and it was right to draw the consequences from it," Grindel said.
infranken.de.309597.18: "I handled the ominous watch gift completely transparently and unsuspectingly.
infranken.de.309597.19: Many in the DFB knew about it."
infranken.de.309597.20: He never "made a secret of the gift," assured the 58-year-old.
infranken.de.309597.21: "This may be called naive, at least this form of transparency was the complete opposite of corruption."
faz.79601.1: "Black Lives Matter": Injured and one dead
faz.79601.2: Protests against police violence in the United States have come to a head again with Donald Trump's use of federal police in several cities.
faz.79601.3: On Saturday, there were clashes between demonstrators and police in various cities.
faz.79601.4: Three people were injured in Louisville and 16 people were arrested in Seattle.
faz.79601.5: In Austin, one person was killed by gunfire while a demonstration train was crossing an intersection.
faz.79601.6: Previously, there had been clashes in Portland during protests against racism and police violence.
faz.79601.7: The security forces, including federal police officers, used tear gas and violently dispersed demonstrators on the night of Saturday.
faz.79601.8: Hundreds of demonstrators, some armed, marched through Louisville in Kentucky on Saturday, demanding that those responsible for the death of Breonna Taylor be held accountable.
faz.79601.9: The 26-year-old student was shot dead in March during a drug raid on her apartment in Louisville.
faz.79601.10: The target of the raid was someone else who did not live there, and no drugs were found.
faz.79601.11: Three people were injured when a member of a group that describes itself as an armed alliance of black Americans fired a shot on Saturday.
faz.79601.12: According to NBC, they were taken to the hospital.
faz.79601.13: None of them were in mortal danger.
faz.79601.14: The police set up barricades because counter-demonstrators from a white militia had also formed.
faz.79601.15: In the end, the two groups did not meet.
faz.79601.16: In Austin, Texas, one person was shot and died during a "Black Lives Matter" demonstration.
faz.79601.17: According to the police, a suspect was taken into custody.
faz.79601.18: She has not yet given any further details on the circumstances of the offence.
faz.79601.19: Mayor Steve Adler, according to the New York Times, said he, like many in the city, was "inconsolable and stunned" by what had happened.
faz.79601.20: Protesters also clashed with police in the American metropolis of Seattle on Saturday.
faz.79601.21: They set fire to construction vehicles in front of a youth prison, and the police used flash grenades and pepper spray.
faz.79601.22: According to the Seattle Times, 16 people were arrested for resisting police officers or assault.
faz.79601.23: In the city of Oakland, California, a courthouse was set on fire.
faz.79601.24: A small group of demonstrators smashed windows, shot fireworks and blinded police officers with lasers, Oakland police said late on Saturday night (local time).
faz.79601.26: In Aurora, a suburb of Denver, Colorado, a car drove through a crowd demonstrating on a highway.
faz.79601.27: According to the police, one of the demonstrators fired a gun and at least one person was taken to the hospital injured.
faz.79601.28: In addition, windows were also smashed in a court and a fire was set, according to the police.
infranken.de.309607.1: Rakoczy in Bad Kissingen: Historical costumes defy Corona
infranken.de.309607.2: Although the big snack was missing in the spa town, visitors and performers enjoyed the Rakoczy flair of the alternative program.
infranken.de.309607.3: It was unusual for visitors, performers and organizers: the Rakoczy weekend without the Rakoczy festival.
infranken.de.309607.4: But even if the big party mile in the city center was missing, the crowds and program highlights such as Saale burning, Rakoczy ball or parade, many got their money's worth with the corona-compliant alternative program.
infranken.de.309607.5: "I think we have succeeded in spreading Rakoczy flair," says spa director Sylvie Thormann.
infranken.de.309607.6: The guests would have accepted it well.
infranken.de.309607.7: In principle, one returns to the beginnings of the Rakoczy festival, when only the historical ones were in the focus of the festival.
infranken.de.309607.9: Vesna Konhäuser has been visiting Bad Kissingen with her husband for more than 25 years.
infranken.de.309607.10: This is also the case this time in the Corona year.
infranken.de.309607.11: The couple has made themselves comfortable at the Luitpold casino, watches the historical while strolling and listens to the Cuban live music at the casino restaurant.
infranken.de.309607.12: "I also find it very pleasant," says Konhäuser.
infranken.de.309607.13: She does not miss the crowds that otherwise belong to Rakoczy.
infranken.de.309607.14: But it lacks the usual program highlights, above all Saale burns on Friday evening as well as the historic procession and the final fireworks on Sunday evening.
infranken.de.309607.16: The weather would have been great this year," she says.
infranken.de.309607.17: Rakoczy riding tournament to take place again
infranken.de.309607.18: For the performers of the historic spa guests, the alternative program partly meant more work.
infranken.de.309607.19: For example, for Christina Gold, who participates in the procession in a normal year and can be seen there on the carriage of the Kurgartencafé.
infranken.de.309607.20: This year she was walking in the city on Saturdays and Sundays in costume.
infranken.de.309607.21: "It's more strenuous, otherwise it's easier," she says.
infranken.de.309607.22: The riding club had less to do, even if individual riders were out and about in the park.
infranken.de.309607.23: "We very much hope that the riding quadrille can take place again next year," says chairwoman Ulrike Waldhofen.
infranken.de.309607.24: She announced that after a break of several years, a Rakoczy riding tournament will take place again in 2021.
morgenpost.de.276358.1: 28 corona cases in Spanish second division Fuenlabrada
morgenpost.de.276358.2: The Spanish football second division CF Fuenlabrada is sliding deeper and deeper into crisis due to a coronavirus outbreak.
morgenpost.de.276358.3: Since the newcomer from the vicinity of Madrid had flown to the city of A Coruna for a match on 20 July despite the first cases of coronavirus, one low blow has followed the next.
morgenpost.de.276358.4: By Sunday, 28 players or team members had tested positive, and one was hospitalized, the club announced.
morgenpost.de.276358.5: Fuenlabrada from the city of the same name south-west of Madrid still had the chance to reach the promotion playoffs.
morgenpost.de.276358.6: Now even the relegation to the B group of the second league threatens.
morgenpost.de.276358.7: Last Monday's match against Deportivo La Coruna was cancelled at the last moment, the public prosecutor's office is investigating a possible crime against public health, the supreme sports authority CSD is considering the forced relegation of the club.
morgenpost.de.276358.8: The players and other team members are quarantined in a hotel.
morgenpost.de.276358.9: "Until the sixth day of quarantine, they did not receive a fresh towel or gel," wrote the sports newspaper "AS".
morgenpost.de.276358.10: The photos show players hanging underwear and club clothes in their rooms in the hotel to dry after they apparently had to wash them themselves.
morgenpost.de.276358.11: The bed linen was not changed for five days.
morgenpost.de.276358.13: "AS" wrote that it was neither good nor sufficient.
morgenpost.de.276358.14: The club management, however, said that they were satisfied with the hotel.
morgenpost.de.276358.15: The accusation of deliberately endangering public health was rejected by the club's lawyer, Javier Tebas Llanas.
morgenpost.de.276358.16: According to Javier Tebas, the son of the president of the Spanish Primera Division, the news agency Europa Press and the sports newspaper "Marca" have not been violated.
morgenpost.de.276358.17: Before departure, there had been four infected persons by 19 July, but they had all been isolated and had not travelled with them.
morgenpost.de.276358.18: All players and team members were tested again immediately before the flight on Monday.
morgenpost.de.276358.19: When the team had already arrived in A Coruna, "five or six" other team members had tested positive for the coronavirus.
morgenpost.de.276358.20: The match was cancelled 60 minutes before kick-off, Tebas Llanas said.
mainpost.de.409271.1: Police must catch pulled-out horses at Dampfach
mainpost.de.409271.2: Two animals were on the road.
mainpost.de.409271.3: The police led her back to her owner.
mainpost.de.409271.4: On Sunday morning shortly before 6 o'clock a road user informed two free-running horses on the feeder between the junction Donnersdorf/Steinsfeld and the motorway junction Theres.
mainpost.de.409271.5: When the officials arrived, the horses were already back between the feeder and the village of Dampfach.
mainpost.de.409271.6: After the officials had won the trust of the horses shortly before Dampfach, they each had a rope carried along in the patrol car.
azonline.de.86610.1: Professional cyclist Tony Martin: career continuation imaginable
azonline.de.86610.2: Time trial specialist Tony Martin is considering a continuation of his career.
azonline.de.86610.3: Frankfurt/Main - Seven-time time trial world champion Tony Martin can certainly imagine continuing his cycling career.
azonline.de.86610.4: "I am currently setting out the framework conditions with the team as to how and in what form things could continue," the 35-year-old told the "Frankfurter Allgemeine Sonntagszeitung".
azonline.de.86610.5: Martin is currently employed by the Dutch team Jumbo-Visma and had considered ending his career after this year before the corona break.
azonline.de.86610.6: The negotiations with his team are also about the number of race days, he said.
azonline.de.86610.7: Or about other problems that would plague him as a family man, Martin said.
azonline.de.86610.8: He used to get up after a fall, and the first thought was: "Get back on the bike quickly.
azonline.de.86610.9: Today, as the father of a little daughter, I think: what if".
azonline.de.86610.10: The professional cyclist admitted that there are aspects with which he is increasingly struggling.
azonline.de.86610.11: "But it was good for me to notice from the corona time what I have in cycling and how much fun it is for me."
azonline.de.86610.12: The time trial specialist returns to the competition at the Tour de l'Ain (5 to 9 August).
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.1: Bavaria: At least four dead on Bavaria's roads at the weekend
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.2: The beautiful weather attracts bikers to the streets in many places.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.3: For at least three people, the tour with the motorcycle ends fatally.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.5: Schönthal - Several, mostly young people died in accidents on Bavaria's roads at the weekend.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.6: An 18-year-old female motorcyclist was hit by a car on the opposite lane near Schönthal (Cham district) on Saturday.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.7: Why the car ran into the opposite lane was initially unclear.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.8: In Upper Bavaria, a 22-year-old man collided with a horse-drawn carriage on his machine on Saturday.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.9: According to the police, he was travelling downhill at Beilngries.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.10: In a left turn, he crashed into the carriage.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.11: His injuries were so severe that he died at the scene of the accident.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.12: Of the twelve occupants of the carriage, one man was seriously injured and one man was slightly injured, according to the police.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.13: An 18-year-old died in another fatal accident in Bad Kötzting, Upper Palatinate.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.14: He had laid down on a road on the night of Sunday and was run over by a 42-year-old driver.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.15: According to the police, the 18-year-old wanted to sleep.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.16: The driver could no longer brake in time.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.17: At Schönberg (Freyung-Grafenau district) on Saturday, a 57-year-old biker crashed head-on against a car in a right-hand bend despite full braking.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.18: He died at the scene of the accident.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.19: The 57-year-old driver suffered a shock, the other three people in the car remained uninjured.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.20: The safety of motorcyclists was discussed on Saturday by Bavaria's transport minister Kerstin Schreyer (CSU).
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.21: In a letter to the organiser of the biker protests against driving bans announced for August, Gabor Kovacs, the minister referred to extensive investments such as underride protection on crash barriers and the defusing of dangerous curves.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.22: "We have achieved a lot for the safety of motorcyclists in recent years," the letter said.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.23: "The number of motorized two-wheelers killed fell by around 28 percent compared to 2011."
freiepresse.de.254098.1: Kovac tests with Monaco against Frankfurt
freiepresse.de.254098.2: Frankfurt/Main (dpa) - For football coach Niko Kovac there will soon be a reunion with Eintracht Frankfurt with his new club AS Monaco.
freiepresse.de.254098.3: The eight-time French champion will make a guest appearance on 1 August (6 p.m.) at the Hessen, the former club of the Croat.
freiepresse.de.254098.4: For the Bundesliga club, it is the first and only endurance test before the return match in the Europa League against FC Basel (6 August).
freiepresse.de.254098.5: Due to the coronavirus pandemic, the meeting will be held without spectators.
freiepresse.de.254098.6: "We are especially looking forward to this game.
freiepresse.de.254098.7: It's always nice to come to Frankfurt and meet friends," explained Kovac.
freiepresse.de.254098.8: Sportingly, this is an interesting test, said the 48-year-old.
freiepresse.de.254098.9: Before joining Bayern Munich, Kovac had coached Hessen from 2016 to 2018 and led them to victory in the DFB-Pokal.
freiepresse.de.254098.10: "A top-class opponent like Monaco is a good test for us in terms of the game against Basel.
freiepresse.de.254098.11: Like all Frankfurters, I am looking forward to seeing Niko Kovac again," said Eintracht coach Adi Hütter.
freiepresse.de.254098.12: The 50-year-old Austrian had succeeded the Croat at Eintracht.
freiepresse.de.254098.13: In March, the Frankfurters had lost the round of 16 match against Basel in their own stadium with 0-3.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.1: Nearly 50 new infections: Hof district close to lockdown
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.2: In the district of Hof, the number of known new coronavirus infections continued to increase over the weekend: from 39 on Friday and 43 on Saturday (one person has recovered and no longer falls into this statistic) to 47 on Sunday.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.3: In addition, there is a case in the town of Hof.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.4: The Hof area is thus approaching the critical mark of 50 new infections per 100,000 inhabitants in one week.
euronews-de.199228.1: 700 dead due to monsoon rains in Southeast Asia
euronews-de.199228.2: More than 9 million people are affected by the severe floods in Southeast Asia, mainly in Bangladesh, India and Nepal.
euronews-de.199228.3: A total of 700 people were killed due to the heavy monsoon rains.
euronews-de.199228.4: In Bangladesh, the Red Crescent is trying to reach the isolated people in boats.

handelsblatt.com.292809.2: The new demands could not be met, the Ministry of Economy in Buenos Aires announced on Saturday.
handelsblatt.com.292809.3: "This would not only be irresponsible, but also unfair," it said in a statement.
handelsblatt.com.292809.4: "While 50 percent of children in Argentina live in poverty, we cannot increase the short-term profits of our creditors."
handelsblatt.com.292809.5: The debts of the second largest economy in South America are no longer sustainable under current conditions.
handelsblatt.com.292809.6: That is why Argentina is asking its private creditors to waive part of their claims of around 66 billion US dollars (around 59 billion euros).
handelsblatt.com.292809.7: If no agreement is reached, the country is again threatened with state bankruptcy.
handelsblatt.com.292809.8: It would be the ninth default in Argentine history.
handelsblatt.com.292809.9: Most recently, lenders had demanded higher interest rates on government bonds and changes to some contractual clauses.
handelsblatt.com.292809.10: However, the Argentine government is sticking to its last offer and is not prepared to make any further concessions.
handelsblatt.com.292809.11: Argentina is in a severe financial and economic crisis.
handelsblatt.com.292809.12: The inflation rate was recently more than 50 percent.
handelsblatt.com.292809.13: Experts expect economic strength to decline by around ten percent this year.
handelsblatt.com.292809.14: At the end of May, Argentina had not settled interest claims amounting to 503 million US dollars and had thus slipped into a limited default.
pnp.de.390078.2: "It's going super well" - this is the conclusion Dr. Stefanie Kramer draws after her first days in the notary's office in Eggenfelden.
pnp.de.390078.3: In the end, everything went very quickly: In mid-May, Dr. Stefanie Kramer learned that she will succeed Lutz Feller at the Eggenfelden notary's office.
pnp.de.390078.4: Already six weeks later, at the beginning of July, the lawyer, who holds a doctorate, started work, and normal day-to-day business has long been in full swing.
pnp.de.390078.5: "However, I still have to arrive privately," she explains in conversation with the Rottaler Anzeiger and laughs.
pnp.de.390078.6: Of course, the short lead time was not enough to completely relocate the center of life from Regensburg to Eggenfelden, reports the native Dingolfingerin.
pnp.de.390078.7: She is currently looking for a suitable apartment or house in the city with her husband, who works as a judge at the regional court in Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.8: At least her husband was able to apply for parental leave at short notice to ensure the care of the two daughters (31⁄2 and 11⁄2 years old).
pnp.de.390078.9: In order not to have to commute every day from Regensburg, she also has an overnight accommodation with her parents in Dingolfing, explains the 39-year-old.
pnp.de.390078.10: Having grown up in the neighbouring district, the town of Eggenfelden has of course long been known to her.
pnp.de.390078.11: During visits on site with her family in recent months, she once again stated: "Eggenfelden is a really beautiful small town."
pnp.de.390078.12: She was all the more pleased that she had made the race in the selection process for the vacancy.
pnp.de.390078.13: Her homeland of Lower Bavaria also plays a central role in Dr. Stefanie Kramer's professional career: After studying law in Passau, she completed her legal traineeship and the second state examination in Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.14: After several positions as a notary assessor, among others in Rehau and Hof in Upper Franconia, Babenhausen in the Lower Allgäu and Regensburg - during this time she also shouldered her doctorate in employment law - she took up her first position as a notary in Rotthalmünster in the district of Passau in 2012.
pnp.de.390078.15: In 2016, she went on parental leave, followed by the move to Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.16: Since then, she has taken over representation services in various notarial offices.
pnp.de.390078.17: When the position in Eggenfelden was advertised due to Lutz Feller's approaching retirement, she saw the right time for her full professional return, explains the 39-year-old.
pnp.de.390078.18: The team of her predecessor, who will take over the vacation representation in the notarial office in the future, has completely taken over Dr. Stefanie Kramer - and immediately has a praise for the team of the law firm ready: "It's going super well!"
pnp.de.390078.19: The fact that she can rely on well-established processes here makes it easier for her to take care of the upcoming relocation of the private centre of life.
pnp.de.390078.20: She has already contacted a local institution regarding kindergarten and nursery places.
pnp.de.390078.21: And if everything works out as desired, she hopes to be able to pursue her hobby here soon - and get to know the most beautiful jogging trails in the Rottal.
an-online.de.487062.1: BVB plans to start the league with a maximum of 15,000 spectators
an-online.de.487062.2: Dortmund The largest German football stadium in Dortmund will not even be filled to 20 percent at the start of the season in the event of a fan return.
an-online.de.487062.3: "Due to the distance regulation, which must be observed, we are currently planning with 12,000 to 15,000 spectators," Borussia Dortmund's managing director Carsten Cramer told the "Tagesspiegel".
an-online.de.487062.4: Normally, the arena in the district city holds just over 81,000 spectators at Bundesliga matches.
an-online.de.487062.5: In the ghost games caused by the corona pandemic last season, BVB lost around four million euros per game.
an-online.de.487062.6: Cramer, who is responsible for marketing, digitalisation and internationalisation at the BVB, hopes that, in addition to the normal spectator seats, some of the approximately 4,000 seats in the hospitality sector can also be opened up again: "It is, of course, a blow to the bank if these revenues completely disappear."
an-online.de.487062.7: In view of the ongoing coronavirus crisis, everyone is currently "well advised to take a stable side first".
an-online.de.487062.8: "If many companies are not doing well and 6.8 million people in Germany alone are in short-time work, then the need for entertainment is limited," explained Cramer.
an-online.de.487062.9: The Dortmund marketing boss praised the BVB professionals for their partial salary waiver, which is intended to help overcome the crisis: "Of course, the players know that their salary waiver has a different effect than if we put 100 people who work in merchandising on short-time work."
kurier.at.204565.1: Tiny miracles: Early start in life with a few hundred grams
kurier.at.204565.2: Hardly heavier than a pack of butter, just three tablespoons of blood in his entire body: that was Gabriel when he was born - he weighed exactly 273 grams.
kurier.at.204565.3: The boy is one of around 400 premature babies who are cared for annually at the Graz Children's Hospital.
kurier.at.204565.4: A quarter of them weigh less than 1,500 grams, a few - like Gabriel and his brothers Raphael and Michael - are extreme lightweights with less than a kilogram of birth weight.
kurier.at.204565.5: They are so small and born so early that neither lungs, nor intestines, nor muscles are fully developed.
kurier.at.204565.6: Their skin is sometimes so delicate that they could injure the electrodes of an ECG.
kurier.at.204565.7: And they are so tiny that they sometimes wear doll clothes and mini diapers made especially for them.
kurier.at.204565.8: But not so small that they don't have a voice - "and how," smiles Berndt Urlesberger.
kurier.at.204565.9: "Even if they don't scream as loudly as big babies, of course."
schwaebische-post.de.62177.1: When the whiteboard becomes a stage
schwaebische-post.de.62177.2: Despite Corona Theater in the classroom: The whiteboard as a stage experienced the 9th grade of the Sankt-Jakobus-Gymnasium in Abtsgmünd shortly before the start of the holiday.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.3: Actress Julia Sylvester from the Theater der Stadt Aalen presented the production "Das Heimatkleid" to the students - via video.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.4: Afterwards, the students were able to exchange ideas about the play and the performance with the actress and the director Winfried Tobias via Skype.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.5: The idea for the performance format from the current corona situation was born.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.6: Teacher Teresa Nar was happy about the enrichment of the lessons.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.7: Even if all those involved agreed in the end that the direct encounter in the theatre and stage space would offer additional stimuli, you can also see the potential for contact with the schools in the theatre.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.8: "If we continue to improve the technical framework, this could be an interesting addition to the game operation," emphasized director Winfried Tobias.

abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.2: Should TSV 1860 qualify for the DFB-Pokal, the Lions will meet Eintracht Frankfurt in the first round.

mz-web.de.376296.1: "Gone with the Wind": Film legend Olivia de Havilland is dead
mz-web.de.376296.2: The film legend and Oscar winner Olivia de Havilland is dead.
mz-web.de.376296.3: She died a natural death on Sunday in Paris at the age of 104, confirmed her spokeswoman for the German Press Agency.
mz-web.de.376296.4: De Havilland was known for her role as Melanie Hamilton in the southern epic "Gone with the Wind" (1939).
mz-web.de.376296.5: Born to British parents in Tokyo, Olivia de Havilland moved to California as an infant.
mz-web.de.376296.6: The Austrian theatre man Max Reinhardt discovered the 19-year-old in the role of Hermia of Shakespeare's "Midsummer Night's Dream".
mz-web.de.376296.7: The film studio Warner Brothers signed her for seven years and brought her out with Eroll Flynn.
mz-web.de.376296.8: She made eight films with the heartbreaker.
mz-web.de.376296.9: In 1946 she won her first Oscar in the leading role of "To Each His Own".
mz-web.de.376296.10: The film was shown in Germany under the title "Mutterherz".
mz-web.de.376296.11: Three years later came the award for best actress in William Wyler's "The Heiress".
mz-web.de.376296.12: She also received a lot of recognition as a neurotic eccentric in "The Dark Mirror" and "The Snake Pit".
mz-web.de.376296.13: Daphne du Maurier proposed her in 1952 for the leading role in the film adaptation of her novel "My Cousin Rachel".
mz-web.de.376296.14: The piece became a worldwide success.
mz-web.de.376296.15: With her long-time friend Bette Davis, she played in "Lullaby for a Corpse".
mz-web.de.376296.16: His son Benjamin emerged from his marriage to the writer Marcus Goodrich (1946 to 1953).
mz-web.de.376296.17: In Paris, de Havilland married the journalist Pierre Paul Galante and had a daughter, Giséle, with him.
mz-web.de.376296.19: However, rumours of an affair with former British Prime Minister Edward Heath have never been confirmed.
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.1: "Road to Timmendorf": Beach volleyball: Thole/Wickler miss final at comeback
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.2: World Cup runners-up Julius Thole and Clemens Wickler missed the final at the beach volleyball tournament "Road to Timmendorf".
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.3: At the meeting of the top teams in Düsseldorf, they lost in the semifinals to their national team colleagues Nils Ehlers and Lars Flüggen with 1:2 (17:21, 21:17, 19:21).
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.4: Most recently, Thole/Wickler played at the World Tour Final in Rome in September last year.
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.5: In the final on the Rhine, their conquerors Ehlers/Flüggen lost to the surprise team Lukas Pfretschner and his interim partner Steven van de Velde 0-2 (17:21, 17:21).
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.6: In addition to the show tournament, three starting places for the German championships were played in Timmendorfer Strand at the beginning of September: The tickets were secured by Armin Dollinger/Simon Kulzer, Manuel Harms/Richard Peemüller and Simon Pfretschner/Milan Sievers.
paz-online.de.95211.1: Kalbitz ejection from AfD confirmed - FDP speaks of "fig leaf"
paz-online.de.95211.2: The expulsion of Andreas Kalbitz from the AfD is in the view of the FDP only a "fig leaf" and does not change the character of the party.
paz-online.de.95211.3: "The AfD is the parliamentary arm of the far-right in Germany.
paz-online.de.95211.4: Andreas Kalbitz is only part of the tip of the iceberg of the radicals in the AfD," FDP domestic politician Benjamin Strasser told the dpa news agency in Berlin.
paz-online.de.95211.5: The Federal Arbitration Court of the AfD had confirmed on Saturday in Stuttgart, after several hours of hearing, the exclusion of Kalbitz, which the Federal Executive Board had decided by a majority in May.
paz-online.de.95211.6: Kalbitz is chairman of the AfD parliamentary group in the Brandenburg state parliament.
paz-online.de.95211.7: "If the AfD really wanted to consistently remove right-wing extremists from their party, officials like Björn Höcke and his supporters would have been excluded long ago," Strasser said.
paz-online.de.95211.8: "However, there is no political will for this in the AfD, because right-wing extremism is now part of the party."
paz-online.de.95211.9: CSU General Secretary Markus Blume said similarly: "The fact that Andreas Kalbitz is now excluded says nothing and does not change anything," he told "Welt am Sonntag".
paz-online.de.95211.10: "It speaks volumes how many frenetic supporters a right-wing extremist still has in the middle of the AfD."
paz-online.de.95211.11: Blume assumes that the AfD will end up below five percent in future elections.
paz-online.de.95211.12: "The days of the AfD in the parliaments are numbered".
paz-online.de.95211.13: Kalbitz was one of the spokesmen of the officially dissolved "wing" around the Thuringian AfD state and parliamentary group chairman Björn Höcke; the Office for the Protection of the Constitution classifies the strip as a "secured right-wing extremist effort".
paz-online.de.95211.14: In May, the AfD federal executive had kicked Kalbitz out of the party.
paz-online.de.95211.15: As a reason, he stated that Kalbitz had not stated an earlier membership in the now banned right-wing extremist "Heimattreue Deutsche Jugend" (HDJ) and among the Republicans when he joined the party.
paz-online.de.95211.16: Kalbitz denies membership in the HDJ.
paz-online.de.95211.17: The chairman of the left-wing faction in the Brandenburg state parliament, Sebastian Walter, also stressed that the decision of the Federal Arbitration Court did not change the character of the AfD: "The wolf only ate chalk.
paz-online.de.95211.18: The AfD remains a far-right party, with or without Kalbitz."
paz-online.de.95211.19: Neither the federal party nor the right wing will be weakened by this decision.
paz-online.de.95211.20: "The manoeuvre of the Meuthen troops is transparent.
paz-online.de.95211.21: They want to avoid further observation by the Office for the Protection of the Constitution and try to get through under the radar," said Walter.
paz-online.de.95211.22: "The AfD will not get rid of the spirits it called.
paz-online.de.95211.23: A throw-out does not change anything," commented the Brandenburg SPD general secretary Erik Stohn on the decision in the Kalbitz case.
paz-online.de.95211.24: "Here, the AfD regional association and the parliamentary group held to their right-wing leader until today."
paz-online.de.95211.25: The legal dispute over Kalbitz's membership in the AfD will continue.
paz-online.de.95211.26: He announced on Saturday that he would now take civil action against the decision of the Federal Arbitration Court.
paz-online.de.95234.1: North Sea wind farms deliver a good 21 percent more electricity
paz-online.de.95234.2: The wind power plants on the German North Sea fed 11.51 terawatt hours of electricity into the grid in the first six months of the year.
paz-online.de.95234.3: This is a good 21 percent more than in the same period last year, said network operator Tennet in Bayreuth.
paz-online.de.95234.4: Tennet is responsible for the transmission of North Sea electricity to the mainland and the transmission through the German electricity grid.
paz-online.de.95234.5: The wind turbines on the Baltic Sea, which are not part of Tennet's grid area, have fed in another 2.22 terawatt hours (TWh) of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.6: Overall, wind power from the North Sea and Baltic Sea comes to 13.73 TWh, compared to a good 11.64 TWh in the first half of 2019.
paz-online.de.95234.7: The wind harvest at sea thus accounts for almost 19 percent of total wind power in Germany, which is about four percentage points more than a year ago.
paz-online.de.95234.8: New wind farms ensure higher generation capacity
paz-online.de.95234.9: In addition to the wind conditions, the increased contribution of offshore wind energy results from higher generation capacities, because new wind farms have been connected to the grid in the past twelve months.
paz-online.de.95234.10: If the 1270 wind power plants in the North Sea were all running at full power at the same time, they could generate 6.7 gigawatts of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.11: The transmission capacity is sufficient; according to Tennet, it is 7.1 gigawatts.
paz-online.de.95234.12: It is expected to rise to 17 gigawatts in the German North Sea by 2030.
paz-online.de.95234.13: "In Germany and the Netherlands, we are investing 20 billion euros in the expansion of offshore grid connections by then," said Tennet Managing Director Tim Meyerjürgens.
paz-online.de.95234.14: In reality, wind farms cannot exhaust their capacity even at sea, but reach around 40 percent.
paz-online.de.95234.15: The previous record day this year is January 2, when the North Sea wind farms generated more than six gigawatts of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.16: On average, the North Sea wind turbines produce about 2.5 to 3.0 gigawatts of electricity, which corresponds to three to four nuclear power plants.
paz-online.de.95234.17: This could supply almost seven million households with electricity.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.1: Art "Skirmish" - an exhibition of the Leipzig artist Christian Bold in the gallery of the Gmünder Kunstverein.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.2: This was almost a small anniversary celebration for the 130th anniversary.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.3: Birthday of the Gmünder Kunstverein: The exhibition opening "Skirmish" with works by the Leipzig artist Christian Bold broke the usual framework after the corona break.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.4: Many more art lovers than usual followed the dialogue between the artist and the chairman of the Kunstverein, Professor Dr. Klaus Ripper.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.5: The musical equivalent was provided by the band "Defenders of the Universe" on the southern Kornhausplatz.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.6: North of the gallery the association "Sandtogether" was involved.
dnn-online.de.39567.1: Freital: Windbergfest cancelled due to corona
dnn-online.de.39567.2: The Windbergfest will not take place this year.
dnn-online.de.39567.3: The city of Freital has cancelled the three-day festival planned for September.
dnn-online.de.39567.4: In other years, more than 30,000 people had attended this city festival.
dnn-online.de.39567.5: "We really did not make this decision easy for ourselves and - aware of how difficult it is economically for the participants - hoped until the last minute," explained Lord Mayor Uwe Rumberg (non-partisan).
dnn-online.de.39567.6: "But ultimately, as the organizer, we are responsible for the health of many thousands of people."
dnn-online.de.39567.7: If tens of thousands had flocked to the festival grounds and into the marquee, minimum distances, hygiene regulations and contact tracing could not have been complied with in accordance with the current coronavirus protection regulation.
dnn-online.de.39567.8: Or the restrictions would have been so severe that not much would have remained of a folk festival.
dnn-online.de.39567.9: In addition, the organisational and monitoring effort would increase disproportionately.
dnn-online.de.39567.10: Rumberg put off for next year.
dnn-online.de.39567.11: Then the city of Freital will celebrate its 100th anniversary with the Winterbergfest from 7 to 9 May 2021 and the Day of the Saxons from 10 to 12 September 2021.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.1: Olympic dressage champion Werth not to be beaten in Achleiten
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.2: Achleiten - Six-time Olympic champion Isabell Werth was the outstanding rider at the dressage tournament in Achleiten, Austria.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.3: The 51-year-old from Rheinberg came to four victories in four starts at the weekend.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.4: After winning a Grand Prix with Weihegold and Quantaz, she was also unbeatable on Sunday in the Grand Prix Special and in the freestyle.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.5: On the 15-year-old mare Weihegold, Werth clearly prevailed against the Austrian Victoria Max-Theurer on Abegglen in the Special on Sunday.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.6: The German was also clearly ahead of her 34-year-old pupil Victoria Max-Theurer in the freestyle on Quantaz on Saturday.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.7: Werth's winning horse Quantaz belongs to Max-Theurer.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.8: The most successful dressage rider in the world is to establish the ten-year-old stallion in the Grand Prix.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.9: For Quantaz it was the first freestyle ever.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.10: Werth had already won all four important competitions at the first tournament in Achleiten three weeks ago.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.11: The last of the three international tournaments is scheduled for August 14-16.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.1: More air traffic controllers in Worms in the future
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.2: Worms University continues to take to the skies: "DFS Deutsche Flugsicherung" endows a professorship for "Air Traffic Management".
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.3: A corresponding contract between the university and DFS has now been signed in Worms.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.4: The contract was initially concluded for three years and will start in 2021.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.5: The professorship enables students to start their studies not only in the summer semester, but also in the winter semester.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.6: This means that twice as many students can be trained as before.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.7: At the same time, capacities at both the university and the DFS air traffic control academy are being utilised evenly.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.8: DFS will advise the university on the establishment and appointment of the professorship.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.10: Since the summer semester 2019, the first students have been in the Air Traffic Management course as part of their training as air traffic controllers at Worms University of Applied Sciences.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.11: Nine students have already started this year.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.12: So far, the experience of DFS has been very positive, and the students' achievements are excellent.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.13: The combination of study and pilot training makes a significant contribution to further increasing the attractiveness of the pilot profession.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.14: "In these times, funding is not easy for us economically.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.15: However, we firmly expect air traffic to recover and grow again in the long term.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.16: In order to continue fulfilling our legal mandate in the future, we need highly qualified personnel," says Professor Klaus-Dieter Scheurle, CEO of DFS, at the signing of the contract.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.17: "For DFS, the endowed professorship is a future-proof investment that will provide air traffic controllers with a broad, interdisciplinary knowledge base in the long term.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.18: We are therefore continuing our good cooperation with the university and at the same time underlining our attractiveness as an employer."
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.19: This is also underlined by Professor Dr. Jens Hermsdorf, President of the Worms University of Applied Sciences: "The endowed professorship forms an important bridge between science and industry.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.20: With it, we would like to build on the existing cooperation with DFS Deutsche Flugsicherung as a practical partner for the dual bachelor's degree programme in Air Traffic Management."
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.21: The trust of German air traffic control is both a motivation and an obligation for Worms University of Applied Sciences to further expand its teaching and research competence in the future fields of aviation.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.22: Working for the air traffic controllers of tomorrow, the university can set very special highlights and innovative focal points for its students with the first endowed professorship for a dual course of study.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.23: Dr. Denis Alt, State Secretary at the Ministry of Science, Continuing Education and Culture, emphasises: "With its focus on air transport, Worms University of Applied Sciences has a unique selling point in Rhineland-Palatinate.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.24: Today's signing of the cooperation agreement strengthens the university's profile."
main-netz.de.61826.1: Rescue screwdriver lands on the A 45
main-netz.de.61826.2: The A 45 motorway towards Aschaffenburg was fully closed for about 30 minutes on Saturday afternoon, as the rescue helicopter was in action after a traffic accident.
main-netz.de.61826.3: A 76-year-old drove a Ford straight ahead in the Alzenau-Mitte exit at around 12.40 p.m. and landed at the guardrail.
main-netz.de.61826.4: The impact triggered the front airbags, the driver suffered minor injuries to his face and had to be taken to a hospital for treatment.
main-netz.de.61826.5: The 72-year-old passenger's injuries were treated by the emergency doctor and the patient was then flown to a hospital by rescue helicopter.
main-netz.de.61826.6: At present, however, the police assume that there is no danger to life.
main-netz.de.61826.7: The damaged vehicle, which suffered damage of about 2,000 euros, had to be towed away.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.1: Heil wants to test other industries after meat industry
mittelbayerische.de.307327.2: The coronavirus crisis brought conditions in parts of the meat industry to light again.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.4: But are they right - and will it continue?
mittelbayerische.de.307327.5: According to the now planned strict regulations against abuses in the meat industry, Federal Minister of Labour Hubertus Heil (SPD) also wants to examine other sectors.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.6: "We will look at industry by industry and then take appropriate measures for the respective industry if necessary," Heil told the German Press Agency in Berlin.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.7: Germany's employers are already warning against restricting work contracts in general.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.8: After the mass coronavirus outbreak at the meat giant Tönnies in North Rhine-Westphalia, the Federal Cabinet wants to pass a law of salvation this Wednesday.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.9: Large slaughterhouses should no longer be allowed to use external personnel for slaughter, cutting and meat processing.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.10: For this purpose, the use of contract workers and temporary workers is to be prohibited there.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.11: Employer president Ingo Kramer told the dpa: "Finger away from a general restriction of work contracts and temporary employment, if one does not want to completely strangle the economy".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.12: Work contracts, for example, are mandatory for large areas of the trade, the construction industry and plant construction as the basis for their added value at the customer.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.13: "The failures of individuals cannot destroy such an important instrument."
mittelbayerische.de.307327.14: Heil assured: "My goal is not to ban work contracts everywhere in the German economy."
mittelbayerische.de.307327.16: "When an industrial company commissions a craftsman to install a safety system, this is a completely normal work contract."
mittelbayerische.de.307327.17: The German meat industry considers a ban on work contracts and temporary work to be unconstitutional in its industry alone.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.18: It cannot be explained why different labour laws should apply to portioning and packaging cheese in the future than to sausages, according to a statement on the bill, as reported by the "Neue Osnabrücker Zeitung" (Saturday).
mittelbayerische.de.307327.19: A ban would therefore increase the consumer price by 10 to 20 percent per kilo and product.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.20: According to the results of an audit by the NRW Occupational Safety and Health Administration, many Eastern European employees from contract companies worked 16 hours a day in the industry.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.22: Wage was withheld for protective equipment or rent.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.23: It was also found that the situation regarding the accommodation of employees was often miserable.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.24: Heil said that a relatively sharp law had already come into force for the meat industry in 2017.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.25: However, these were bypassed by "tricky constructions".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.26: "Now we have to clean up fundamentally."
mittelbayerische.de.307327.27: The politician announced: "The Occupational Safety and Health Act, which we want to adopt in the cabinet at the end of July, also includes measures that do not only affect the meat industry - for example, higher inspection rates for occupational safety and health or clear criteria for shared accommodation."
mittelbayerische.de.307327.28: The draft presented by dpa includes amendments to the Act on the Protection of Workers' Rights in the Meat Industry and the Occupational Safety and Health Act.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.29: Brandenburg's consumer protection minister Ursula Nonnemacher (Greens) considers more intensive controls necessary.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.30: "I would like us to be able to carry out even more checks in many supervisory areas: food controls, animal welfare, everything possible, including animal transport," said Nonnemacher on Sunday in the RBB programme "Brandenburg aktuell".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.31: However, more staff positions are also needed for more controls.

tt.com.148707.4: Two other people were rescued injured in the accident, said a spokesman for the Wesel district control center.
