rundschau-online.de.151934.1: Clearance of Frankfurt Opera Square proceeds peacefully
rundschau-online.de.151934.2: One week after the riots in Frankfurt, the evacuation of the Opera Square took place peacefully during the night on Sunday.
rundschau-online.de.151934.3: Finally, several dozen people were still in the square, but left before the curfew began at 1 a.m.
rundschau-online.de.151934.4: The police had been on duty with numerous officers since the early evening, and there was a larger police presence throughout the city.
rundschau-online.de.151934.5: For the first time this weekend, from midnight, there was a ban on entering the Opera Square, where riots had occurred a week ago.
rundschau-online.de.151934.6: Police officers were attacked with bottles from the crowd of revelers.
rundschau-online.de.151934.7: At least five officers were injured and several police vehicles were damaged.
rundschau-online.de.151934.8: The night to Saturday had also remained quiet.
hna.de.247362.1: Car rolls over: Young woman seriously injured in accident on Bundesstraße 83 near Hofgeismar
hna.de.247362.2: A 21-year-old suffered serious injuries in an accident between Schöneberg and Hümme at around 1.25 p.m. on Sunday.
hna.de.247362.3: She was taken to the Kassel hospital.
hna.de.247362.4: The fire department was looking for possible passengers with thermal imaging cameras.
hna.de.247362.5: According to the police, the woman was driving on Bundesstraße 83 in the direction of her place of residence, Hümme, when her car got off the road for unknown reasons and overturned several times.
hna.de.247362.6: In order to save the accident, the fire brigade had to cut the roof of the car free.
hna.de.247362.7: Since it was unclear whether anyone was still in the vehicle, the adjacent corn field was searched from the turntable ladder with a thermal imaging camera.
hna.de.247362.8: The drone squadron from Warburg, which also works with thermal imaging cameras, was also ordered to search for people.
hna.de.247362.9: However, the emergency services did not find anyone between the tall maize plants.
hna.de.247362.10: The seriously injured was taken by ambulance to the Kassel hospital for further care.
hna.de.247362.11: Nearly 50 firefighters from the Hofgeismar, Hümme and Schöneberg fire brigades were on site.
hna.de.247362.12: The highway was closed for two hours due to the accident.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.2: Turin - After a redeeming goal from Cristiano Ronaldo, record champion Juventus Turin has secured the Italian championship for the ninth time in a row.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.3: The team around the five-time world footballer made the 36th Scudetto in the club's history perfect with a 2:0 (1:0) on Sunday evening in the home game against Sampdoria Genoa.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.5: With 83 points, Turin, which competed without the recently injured former international Sami Khedira, can no longer be displaced from first place two days before the end of the Serie A season.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.6: Second-placed Inter Milan is seven points behind.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.7: Juventus were harmless despite optical superiority in the first half, then Ronaldo scored after a free-kick variant with the last action.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.8: The 35-year-old used a shot from Miralem Pjanic directly from the penalty area with a flat shot (45.+7).
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.9: Against the now more offensive guests Ronaldo was also involved in the 2:0, after his shot Federico Bernardeschi (67th) dusted off.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.10: This ensured the lackluster but decisive success.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.11: The foul penalty shot to the bar in the 89th minute is only Ronaldo himself with a view to the goal-scoring classification.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.12: "It's complicated to stay at ball level mentally and physically for 90 minutes.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.13: The games are strange, and the momentum changes very slightly," explained coach Maurizio Sarri after the 1-2 draw at Udinese Calcio on Thursday.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.14: Above all, the mental exhaustion of his players is great, said the Juve coach.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.15: Because of the defeat, the Turin team had not yet been able to make the championship perfect.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.16: Juve recently owed its reassuring lead at the top of the standings above all to the weakness of its competitors.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.17: In the eleven games before the match on Sunday, the Sarri team had only managed five victories.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.18: Whether Ronaldo will also be the top scorer is questionable.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.19: While the Portuguese superstar has scored 31 goals so far, the former Dortmunder Ciro Immobile has already scored 34 goals after his three-pack in the 5:1 (1:1) of the fourth-placed Lazio Rome at Hellas Verona - as many as Robert Lewandowski contributed to FC Bayern's title win.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.20: The record in Italy is held by the current Juve pro Gonzalo HiguaÃ3n.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.21: The Argentine scored 36 goals for SSC Napoli in the 2015/2016 season.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.22: The next title opportunity awaits the "Old Lady" of Italian football in August.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.23: Juventus are in the round of 16 of the Champions League, but will have to make up for a 0-1 loss against Olympique Lyon on 7 August to reach the final tournament in Lisbon.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.24: In the next knockout round, Real Madrid or Manchester City would wait as opponents.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.1: Baden-Württemberg: Over 250 illegal car races recorded
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.2: Stuttgart - Despite all the threatened penalties and court rulings, drivers continue to throttle in countless illegal races on the streets of Baden-Württemberg: Last year and the first four months of this year, the police in the southwest have already registered more than 250 illegal car races.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.3: There are no comparable figures for the previous years, but the speeders are increasingly making the judicial authorities work: In 2018, a total of 155 investigations were conducted at the public prosecutor's offices between Konstanz and Mannheim for illegal races, one year later there were already 252 and 151 in the current year until the beginning of June.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.4: The races were less about organised events, as can be seen from the response of the Ministry of the Interior to a request from the state parliament SPD.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.5: In most cases, the drivers spontaneously competed against each other or they took flight from the police - this is also reported as an illegal race.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.6: At the wheel were mainly German men between the ages of 18 and 60.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.8: Only in comparatively few cases are the racers caught and also asked to pay: According to the Interior Ministry, a total of 113 fines have been imposed since 2018 and 15 prison sentences have been issued.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.9: However, there is no evidence that the number of illegal car races is actually increasing.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.10: Rather, other drivers reacted more sensitively than before because of the numerous tragic accidents and processes of past years and reported more frequently, said a ministry spokesman.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.11: The motorway 8 is particularly popular with speeders, where drivers repeatedly slow down traffic in order to make room for themselves and use the free track for a race.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.12: Last August, a dozen riders were caught near Kirchheim unter Teck, three months earlier there were even 18 riders on the A8 near Merklingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.13: A81 is the most popular "race track"
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.14: The police even register more races on the A81 than on any other motorway.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.15: With a speed limit, there is an attempt to slow down the speeders on the particularly affected section between Engen and Geisingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.16: The mostly high-priced and pimped-up sports and luxury cars often have Swiss license plates, because the drivers switch to the lawn in Germany because of the high penalties for driving too fast and racing in the neighboring country.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.17: For the SPD, the speed limit must not be reduced to a few routes: "With a general speed limit of 130 kilometres per hour, we would get rid of this problem on motorways," says Martin Rivoir, the transport expert of the SPD parliamentary group.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.18: "The inhibition threshold for racers would be significantly higher if you were not allowed to travel legally here and there with 200 kilometers per hour and more."
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.19: Rivoir thinks less of enlightenment or image campaigns: "Those who defy all rules in this way and risk not only their own lives, but also the lives of other road users, can hardly be reached with reason."
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.20: ADAC calls for stronger police crackdown
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.21: However, this is not enough for the ADAC: "We assume that speeders will not be deterred by the speed limits," says Holger Bach, head of the transport and environment department at ADAC Württemberg.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.22: It calls for additional and also tougher controls on the affected routes.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.23: Since January 2019 and until April 2020, three people have died in the races nationwide, two of them uninvolved in a night-time crash in Stuttgart's city centre and one in Gerlingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.24: Two young men are said to have competed in a car race there in November.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.25: One of the vehicles came off the road, crashed into a garden wall and remained on the side, the 18-year-old passenger died.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.26: 21 more people were injured in the races of the past two years.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.27: In the opinion of Interior Minister Thomas Strobl, however, tougher penalties are not necessary: "Legislative action to sanction illegal motor vehicle races more severely is not seen," says the paper of the Interior Ministry.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.1: Blue light from July 23: Thirsty burglar steals drinks from snack bar
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.2: Rohrdorf: A man broke into a snack bar in Rohrdorf (Calw district) on Thursday and stole drinks and cash.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.3: A witness heard noises in the valley road at around 3.40 a.m. and ran towards the snack bar.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.4: There he noticed a man who was serving drinks at the refrigerator and then left the snack bar through a previously smashed entrance door.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.5: The perpetrator fled towards the meadows behind the snack bar.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.6: According to the police, the burglar also used a cash register and stole cash in the low three-digit range.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.7: The suspect is described as follows: He is about 1.75 to 1.80 meters tall and of strong stature.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.8: In fact, he was wearing a black hoodie, black trousers and light shoes.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.9: The police receive further witness information.
pnp.de.390142.1: Ackermann sprints to victory on final stage at Sibiu Tour
pnp.de.390142.2: Professional cyclist Pascal Ackermann won his second victory of the day on the final stage of the 10th Sibiu Tour.
pnp.de.390142.3: The 26-year-old Palatine from the Bora-hansgrohe team prevailed in the mass sprint on the 109-kilometre section with start and finish in Sibiu, having already won a stage on Saturday.
pnp.de.390142.4: It was the season wins three and four for Ackermann.
pnp.de.390142.5: In the overall classification, his Austrian team mate Gregor Mühlberger prevailed.
pnp.de.390142.6: The 26-year-old had won the mountain time trial in the morning and thus took the lead in the classification.
pnp.de.390142.7: Only 104 riders had entered the final stage in the evening.
pnp.de.390142.8: No less than 18 starters had fallen victim to the time limit in the mountain time trial.
pnp.de.390142.9: "I'm really happy to start the new season with a victory," Ackermann said after his success on Saturday.
pnp.de.390142.10: "The sprint was really hectic," said the 26-year-old.
pnp.de.390142.11: With 300 metres to go, he simply put on his sprint, "and it worked out perfectly."
pnp.de.390142.12: In accordance with the rules of the UCI, a corona test was carried out on all race participants and their companions six days before the start of the race.
pnp.de.390142.13: During the entire tour, drivers and attendants were separated from the organising team and the media in isolated hygiene bubbles.
pnp.de.390142.14: Spectators at the start and finish were not allowed.
bild.254818.1: Control center gave instructions for lay resuscitation
bild.254818.2: Düsseldorf - Tragic accident on Sunday afternoon in Düsseldorf-Garath.
bild.254818.3: In an apartment building, a child (4) suddenly lay lifeless in the water while bathing.
bild.254818.4: According to the fire department, the emergency call was received shortly before 13:00.
bild.254818.5: "A dispatcher immediately gave instructions for lay resuscitation," a fire department spokesman told BILD.
bild.254818.6: The arriving rescue workers took over the resuscitation measures shortly afterwards.
bild.254818.7: The child, who was in mortal danger, was transported to the university hospital under resuscitation.
bild.254818.9: The police have routinely started investigations into the accident.
bild.254818.10: The fire department spokesman: "We assume a tragic accident in the apartment".
infranken.de.309656.1: Nuremberg: Unauthorised tuning meeting - police intervene, 700 vehicles and around 1100 people
infranken.de.309656.2: Hundreds of cars and at times over 1000 people took part in a "tuning meeting" in the parking lot of a furniture store on Saturday night.
infranken.de.309656.3: The police implemented their announcement to increase control of such events.
infranken.de.309656.4: A big tuning meeting took place on Saturday evening (25 July 2020) in Nuremberg's Südstadt district.
infranken.de.309656.6: According to the Mittelfranken police, the Nuremberg traffic police found an increased number of vehicles in the area of a large parking lot on Ingolstädter Straße at around 10.30 p.m.
infranken.de.309656.7: The police then carried out a large number of vehicle checks.
infranken.de.309656.8: Only recently, the police had announced that they wanted to take increased action against so-called autoposers.
infranken.de.309656.9: Illegal tuning meeting in Nuremberg: Only a small part of the "scene"
infranken.de.309656.10: According to the police, the officers numbered around 700 vehicles and about 1100 people at the top.
infranken.de.309656.11: However, only a small part of those present can be attributed to the "autoposer" and tuning scene.
infranken.de.309656.12: Apparently, most of the relevant scene complied with the police's appeal.
infranken.de.309656.13: Based on the vehicles and people on site, it can be assumed that these were mainly onlookers.
infranken.de.309656.14: In addition, the majority of those present complied with the applicable infection protection regulations, in particular the observance of the minimum distance and the wearing of a mouth-nose protection.
infranken.de.309656.15: The control measures carried out on site were completed around 1:00 a.m.
infranken.de.309656.16: In total, the officials found such structural changes in 10 vehicles that the operating license had expired.
infranken.de.309656.17: Four of these vehicles had to be secured.
infranken.de.309656.19: There were no illegal car races.
infranken.de.309656.20: "The police headquarters in Middle Franconia will continue to keep an eye on what is happening and will continue to carry out increased control measures, also in connection with the emergence of onlookers," it said.
infranken.de.309656.21: The agency News5 spoke to Jürgen Schrödinger from the towing company involved: "They all have beautiful rims, we must not scratch them," says Schrödinger.
infranken.de.309656.22: Special tapes would be used for this.
infranken.de.309656.23: Also because the cars are wider, the company must be careful not to damage them.
infranken.de.309656.24: "After all, the young people should get their cars back unscathed."
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.1: Employment Agency figures: 900 suspected cases of short-time work abuse
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.2: Berlin - According to its own statement, the Federal Employment Agency (BA) is investigating around 900 suspected cases of abuse of short-time workers' allowances.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.3: "This is extremely low for more than 880,000 companies that have reported short-time work," Daniel Terzenbach, the Executive Board member responsible for operations, told the Frankfurter Allgemeine Zeitung.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.4: When many companies suddenly applied for short-time work at the beginning of the corona crisis, the BA had to react quickly.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.5: The exam usually takes up to three weeks.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.6: "We didn't have that much time in this hot phase.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.7: We will therefore take a closer look at the final accounts.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.8: There will certainly be a lot more to come.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.9: We are not naive and have a long breath."
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.10: Evidence of abuse often comes from the affected employees or trade unions.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.11: In addition, the BA uses analysis software to identify abuse patterns.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.12: According to Terzenbach, the BA is preparing for a possible wave of insolvency in the autumn.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.13: "Will there be significantly more insolvencies than in the previous year?
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.14: The assessments differ, but we are preparing ourselves for the case and are already training our employees in the employment agencies to process applications for insolvency money."
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.15: The figures are still inconspicuous, said Terzenbach.
pnn.de.185998.1: World Heritage in Potsdam: Party in the New Garden dissolved
pnn.de.185998.2: Potsdam - On Friday evening, about 40 young people celebrated a party in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.3: The collection was dissolved at 8.48 p.m. by the drivers of the Prussian Palaces and Gardens Foundation (SPSG), the foundation announced on PNN's request.
pnn.de.185998.4: The young people then left the park.
pnn.de.185998.5: On Saturday evening, some young people would have played rugby in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.6: The meadow had been cleared by precinct drivers, said SPSG spokesman Frank Kallensee on Sunday.
pnn.de.185998.7: Again and again there are illegal celebrations in the parks
pnn.de.185998.8: In the parks of the foundation, there are repeated accumulations in which the distance and hygiene rules are not observed.
pnn.de.185998.9: At the end of June there was a celebration with about 300 people in the Park Babelsberg, a week later about 150 people celebrated in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.10: Even without coronavirus regulations, the parks will be closed at nightfall.
pnn.de.185998.11: Camping on the meadows is prohibited according to the park regulations, there are only a few exceptions.
pnn.de.185998.12: The foundation has been complaining for some time that visitors are leaving more and more rubbish and destroying protected biotopes.
pnn.de.185998.13: In Berlin, meanwhile, illegal park parties have reached another dimension.
pnn.de.185998.14: In the Hasenheide in the district of Neukölln, 5,000 people celebrated an illegal techno party on Sunday night.
pnn.de.185998.15: The event was disbanded by the police.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.1: Austria: Mass testing after coronavirus outbreak in tourist resort
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.2: Authorities have responded to a coronavirus outbreak in the popular Upper Austrian tourist resort of St. Wolfgang with hundreds of tests.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.3: The number of confirmed cases rose to 48, according to the state authorities in Linz.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.4: More than 100 results were still pending in the evening.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.5: According to this, many of the infected are young interns in tourism companies, but at least one holiday guest has also tested positive.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.6: Residents, guests and tourism staff were asked to stay in their accommodation on Saturday evening.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.7: The curfew was set at 11 p.m.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.8: "There are cancellations and cancellations there and there" of bookings, said the head of the tourism association Wolfgangsee, Hans Wieser, the dpa.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.10: St. Wolfgang is the most important tourist resort in Upper Austria, with more than 400,000 overnight stays last year.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.11: In a normal season, around a third of the guests are Germans.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.12: On Friday, the first infections had become public knowledge.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.13: The head of the district authority, Alois Lanz, defended on Saturday the behaviour of the interns, who had celebrated in several restaurants and could have become infected there.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.14: "We all enjoyed doing that in our youth," he told radio station Ö1.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.15: However, two bars were closed on Friday to prevent further infections.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.16: The tourism association launched an information campaign to raise awareness among young employees about the dangers of COVID-19.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.17: From Saturday, hundreds of employees, holidaymakers and locals were tested.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.18: In addition, all guests who were in St. Wolfgang from 15 July were contacted.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.19: The outbreak brings back memories of the Austrian ski and party resort of Ischgl in Tyrol, which was a centre of coronavirus spread throughout Europe in the early stages of the pandemic.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.20: In total, more than 1500 people are currently infected with the virus in Austria.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.21: The focus of new infections is on Vienna and Upper Austria.
wn.de.700458.1: Premier League: Man United and Chelsea qualified for Champions League
wn.de.700458.2: London (dpa) - English football record champions Manchester United return to the Champions League after a one-year absence.
wn.de.700458.3: The Red Devils secured third place in the table on the final day of the Premier League by beating direct rivals Leicester City 2-0 (0-0).
wn.de.700458.4: The Foxes now have to settle for the Europa League, because Chelsea FC still passed and qualified for the premier class in fourth place.
wn.de.700458.5: Aston Villa was allowed to cheer in the fight against relegation.
wn.de.700458.6: Manchester United took the lead with a penalty kick from Bruno Fernandes (71 minute).
wn.de.700458.7: After a red card for Leicester City in injury time, Jesse Lingard (90.+8) reached the final score.
wn.de.700458.8: Chelsea, opponents of FC Bayern in the Champions League eighth final, won 2-0 (2-0) against Wolverhampton Wanderers thanks to Mason Mount (45.+1) and Olivier Giroud (45.+4).
wn.de.700458.9: "That means a lot to me," said coach Frank Lampard, who is also in the FA Cup final against Arsenal in his first season as Chelsea coach.
wn.de.700458.10: Chelsea's victory against Wolverhampton also benefited Tottenham Hotspur, who went past the Wolves with a meagre 1-1 (1-0) at Crystal Palace to start sixth in the Europa League.
wn.de.700458.11: Aston Villa won the long-distance duel with Watford and AFC Bournemouth, but had to tremble at West Ham United for a long time.
wn.de.700458.12: The late lead of Jack Grealish (84th) immediately compensated Andrej Jarmolenko (85th).
wn.de.700458.13: But the 1:1 (0:0) was enough, because Watford lost 2:3 (1:3) at Arsenal.
wn.de.700458.14: The club, which had three coaches in the season, is relegated after five first division years.
wn.de.700458.15: Just like Bournemouth, who could not save themselves by a 3:1 (2:1) at Everton.
wn.de.700458.16: In the end, one point was missing.
wn.de.700458.17: Liverpool, who have been English champions since the end of June, secured a club record with a 3-1 (1-1) win at Newcastle United.
wn.de.700458.18: 99 points is the highest score the Reds have ever scored in a football season.
wn.de.700458.19: Coach Jürgen Klopp and his team narrowly missed the points record in English football.
wn.de.700458.20: Manchester City holds the record with 100 points in the 2017/18 season.
wn.de.700458.21: After the Newcastle lead in the first minute, Virgil van Dijk (38th), Divock Origi (59th) and Sadio Mané (89th) turned the game on Sunday for Liverpool.
wn.de.700458.22: "It was an extraordinary season for this wonderful club," said goal scorer van Dijk after the game, "which should spur us on to defend the title.
wn.de.700458.24: The Premier League bosses are also likely to be satisfied in the end.
wn.de.700458.25: Due to the coronavirus crisis, football operations in England were suspended from 13 March to 17 June.
wn.de.700458.26: In the meantime, there was even discussion about a premature abandonment or hosting of the remaining matches on neutral ground.
wn.de.700458.27: Finally, however, the season could be played without any special incidents - but as in Germany without spectators in the stadiums.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.1: Arrests and violence at demonstrations against Netanyahu
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.2: The protests in Israel against Prime Minister Netanyahu are becoming increasingly violent.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.3: During the night there were violent clashes.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.4: On the night of Sunday, the Israeli police violently cracked down on participants in a demonstration against the right-wing conservative Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu in Jerusalem.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.5: Twelve people were arrested for participating in riots, police spokesman Micky Rosenfeld said.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.6: Among other things, the police used water cannons to break up the rally.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.7: According to media reports, around 6,000 people had gathered near Netanyahu's official residence on Saturday evening.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.8: They protested against unemployment, corruption and Netanyahu's handling of the corona crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.9: The protesters beat drums, blew horns and called on Netanyahu to resign.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.10: Participants in a counter-demonstration supporting Netanyahu were also detained, the news website "ynet" reported.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.11: People also demonstrated in many other places in Israel, including in front of the head of government's private villa in the coastal city of Caesarea and in a park in Tel Aviv.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.12: According to police, a man was arrested near Tel Aviv on suspicion of spraying pepper spray from a moving car onto demonstrators on the side of the road.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.13: Another man was arrested after a stabbing attack on a protester in the south of the country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.14: The demonstrator was slightly injured in the neck.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.15: There have recently been several demonstrations against Netanyahu in Jerusalem and Tel Aviv.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.16: The rallies accompany the corruption trial against the head of government.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.17: Most recently, Netanyahu has also been criticized for his handling of the coronavirus crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.18: Among other things, he is accused of hasty relaxations and a lack of preparation for a second wave of coronavirus.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.19: The coronavirus crisis has hit the country's economy hard.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.20: The unemployment rate was recently more than 20 percent.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.21: The number of new coronavirus infections in Israel has recently risen to new record levels.
bild.254850.1: Accident near Ahlen (NRW) - Transporter crashes on car - nine injured - Ruhrgebiet - Bild.de
bild.254850.2: Ahlen - A rear-end collision caused nine minor injuries on the B58 near Ahlen on Saturday afternoon.
bild.254850.3: A car driver was driving with her two children (3, 5) towards Beckum.
bild.254850.4: The police: "Probably she had suddenly slowed down because she wanted to turn."
bild.254850.5: The driver of a Mercedes van driving behind her must have seen this too late.
bild.254850.6: He crashed into the back of the car.
bild.254850.7: Three passengers in the car and six in the van were slightly injured in the accident.
bild.254850.8: Several ambulances took her to a surrounding hospital.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.1: North Korea seals off border town after suspected coronavirus case
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.2: North Korea has so far seen a "shining success" in its own measures to ward off the coronavirus.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.3: The country is now reporting a suspected case for the first time.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.4: Due to a first official suspected coronavirus case in the country, North Korea has completely sealed off a major city for fear of disaster.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.5: Despite the strictest epidemiological defenses in the past six months, "the malignant virus may have been introduced into the country," the state media reported.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.6: A state of emergency has been declared for the region around the border town of Kaesong.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.7: The Communist leadership declared the highest level of alert.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.8: If the suspected case is confirmed, it would be the first official case of infection with Sars-CoV-2 in the isolated country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.9: North Korea has not registered a single infection and described its defensive measures as a "shining success".
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.11: The disease symptoms were reportedly detected in an "outlier" who illegally crossed the military demarcation line between South and North Korea on July 19.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.12: The person left for South Korea three years ago and has now returned across the border.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.13: There was initially no confirmation from South Korea for crossing the border within the four-kilometre-wide and largely still mined military buffer zone.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.14: However, according to reports by the national news agency Yonhap, South Korea's military acknowledged the possibility of an illegal border crossing into North Korea as high.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.15: Investigations were carried out on a number of people.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.16: According to its own statements, North Korea called an emergency meeting of the Politburo of the Workers' Party, chaired by leader Kim Jong Un, on Saturday because of the suspected case.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.17: The "dangerous situation in Kaesong could trigger a deadly and destructive catastrophe."
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.18: Kim had already ordered on Friday as a preventive measure to "completely block Kaesong and isolate every district and the region from others," it continued.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.19: The person concerned and all the people in Kaesong who had been in contact with him were quarantined.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.20: The central military commission of the party should therefore investigate the "outlier case" as well as the behaviour of the responsible military unit and, if necessary, impose severe punishment.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.21: It is estimated that about 300,000 people live in Kaesong.
pz-news.de.72354.1: Excitement ahead of Council meeting: City East and noise protection are still under discussion before a big summer break
pz-news.de.72354.2: "In addition to environmental issues, the committee members will also vote, among other things, on the development plan for the large-scale project Innenstadtentwicklung-Ost," it says rather casually in the middle section of the city press release for the next municipal council meeting on Tuesday, 28 July, at 4.30 p.m. in the Great Hall of the CongressCentrum Pforzheim.
pz-news.de.72354.3: Above all, the upgrading of the eastern city is discussed controversially until the end.
pz-news.de.72354.4: The majorities in favour are narrow, most recently even negative in individual committees depending on attendance.
pz-news.de.72354.5: After almost ten years of preparation, project opponent Reinhard Klein criticised an appeal from business (construction, real estate, trade and IT) not to let the project, which was developed out of the citizenry and then by the administration and municipal council, fail now as "extra-parliamentary opposition", "clueless", "speculation", "vilification" and "deliberate false statements".
pz-news.de.72354.6: "Everyone thinks they know better," says Klein, who has been a member of the municipal council for a year as the only representative of the Pforzheim citizens' list.
pz-news.de.72354.7: In fact, after reading the contracts, he was in this position: "I know what I'm talking about."
pz-news.de.72354.8: The exit is cheaper for the city, the technical town hall is contrary to statements of the city administration after grants, of whose existence Klein is convinced to renovate for 8.5 million euros.
pz-news.de.72354.9: The city will develop completely differently than predicted in the town hall and on the part of the advocates from the economy.
pz-news.de.72354.10: One day after Klein, the FDP/FW/UB/LED faction, which also rejects the project, presented an alternative concept.
pz-news.de.72354.11: It essentially also provides for the renovation of the Technical Town Hall, the opening of the Schloßberg, the renting of the ex-Thales for administrative areas and a more small-scale city centre redesign, ideally with local carriers.
pz-news.de.72354.12: Environmental issues play a central role
pz-news.de.72354.13: Environmental issues will also play a central role.
pz-news.de.72354.14: Among other things, the local council will vote on the noise action plan.
pz-news.de.72354.15: This includes various measures to protect the population of Pforzheim from noise pollution caused by road traffic, including many speed reductions.
pz-news.de.72354.16: In a press release, the local transport club Germany welcomes the widespread introduction of Tempo 30. However, the political leaders in the city are not innocent of the fact that this must happen, because they have only contributed to the massive increase in car traffic and thus noise by neglecting the regular bus traffic with thinned cycles and by little commitment to cycling.
pz-news.de.72354.17: The municipal council also votes on the participation of the city of the energy and climate protection agency Pforzheim/Enzkreis.
pz-news.de.72354.18: In addition, the agenda includes accession to the climate protection pact of the state of Baden-Württemberg, the redefinition of parental contributions in the city's childcare facilities and the application for admission to the federal government's Smart City funding.
pz-news.de.72354.19: Citizens are welcome, but must take coronavirus protection measures to heart.
schwaebische.de.113555.1: Tim Zimmermann starts the new season with a lot of delay
schwaebische.de.113555.2: Tim Zimmermann will start his premiere season in the ADAC GT Masters on 31 July with a delay of almost half a year.
schwaebische.de.113555.3: Before the league of super sports cars can start regular operation, the first test drives were scheduled.
schwaebische.de.113555.4: For Zimmermann, it was all about getting to know his Lamborghini Huracan GT3 better.
schwaebische.de.113555.5: The corona crisis has long prevented Tim Zimmermann from embarking on his first business trip in Grasser Racing's new Lamborghini Huracan.
schwaebische.de.113555.6: This was now possible under special hygiene conditions.
schwaebische.de.113555.7: The 23-year-old Langenargener made his first laps at the Lausitzring and was able to get used to his premiere in the GT3 car.
schwaebische.de.113555.8: "There are already a few things that are different from the Porsche from the previous season," says Zimmermann.
schwaebische.de.113555.9: "With the ABS, for example, you have to go into the corners differently.
schwaebische.de.113555.10: But it was really a lot of fun."
schwaebische.de.113555.11: Zimmermann also had fun with Steijn Schothorst, with whom he will share his orange sports car in the GT Masters.
schwaebische.de.113555.12: Despite being only 25 years old, the Dutchman is already experienced in GT racing and has been able to help his new team-mate in many things.
schwaebische.de.113555.13: "I'm not a beginner in motorsport, but every new series also brings new challenges," says Zimmermann.
schwaebische.de.113555.14: "Steijn and I understand each other brilliantly and we have also made enormous progress from session to session at the Lausitzring."
schwaebische.de.113555.15: Right there - at the Lausitzring - the GT Masters will also hold its first race.
schwaebische.de.113555.16: From 31 July, the 33 super sports cars will race through Lusatia.
schwaebische.de.113555.17: Zimmermann, who is one of 15 serial newcomers, knows the track.
schwaebische.de.113555.18: In 2015, he was a guest at the Motodrom.
schwaebische.de.113555.19: "It worked quickly and I didn't have to get used to the track," says Zimmermann, who starts for the Friedrichshafen racing community Graf Zeppelin.
schwaebische.de.113555.20: "The Lausitzring has many fast passages that you have to hit optimally to be fast."
schwaebische.de.113555.21: It turns out in two weeks how fast Zimmermann really is.
schwaebische.de.113555.22: "Of course, the teams play a little poker during the tests," he says.
schwaebische.de.113555.23: "Finally, however, we are very satisfied and look forward to the first weekend at the Lausitzring."
schwaebische.de.113555.24: The race in Brandenburg will be the start of a tightly packed calendar.
schwaebische.de.113555.25: Seven races are scheduled until the beginning of November.
schwaebische.de.113555.26: The current state is that no spectators will be allowed - but there is a prominent guest.
schwaebische.de.113555.27: Ex-Formula 1 driver Niko Hülkenberg will enter the GT steering wheel at the Nürburgring in mid-August.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.1: British Transport Minister caught cold by quarantine decision
wienerzeitung.at.136148.2: The British government's decision to quarantine Spanish holidaymakers for two weeks after their return has caught the country's transport minister cold, according to press reports.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.3: Grant Shapps is currently on holiday in Spain, of all places, while his colleagues at home decided on the measure on Saturday.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.4: Due to the rising coronavirus numbers in Spain, the cabinet in London removed the country from the list of countries from which entry is possible without quarantine requirements.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.5: The new regulation will apply from today, Sunday, so Shapps will also have to quarantine after his return.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.6: In Austria, the government has also imposed quarantine measures on returnees.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.7: However, the scheme does not apply to those who are currently on holiday until Saturday, 1 August, and has not been introduced overnight.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.8: Incidentally, Spain is still considered one of the "safe countries" in Austria for which no quarantine is required.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.9: "Many ministers may have known in advance that there is a possibility of a quarantine being imposed on holidaymakers in Spain," commented Labour MP Diane Abbot.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.10: "But apparently nobody bothered to tell Grant Shapps."
wienerzeitung.at.136148.11: Less than a month after the end of the coronavirus emergency in Spain and the end of the strict curfew, the number of infections in the country is rising again.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.12: Virologists mainly blame the nightlife for the renewed spread.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.13: Spain is one of the favourite holiday destinations of the British.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.14: The British government is currently advising against unnecessary travel to the Spanish mainland, except for the Canary Islands and Balearic Islands, which are particularly popular with British holidaymakers.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.15: To date, more than 272,000 infections with the novel coronavirus and more than 28,000 deaths have been recorded in Spain.
mz-web.de.376126.1: Russia: Navy Day: Putin announces hypersonic weapons for warships
mz-web.de.376126.2: Russian President Vladimir Putin has announced that warships in his country will be equipped with state-of-the-art hypersonic weapons on Navy Day.
mz-web.de.376126.3: With these weapons, which are unique in the world, the combat capabilities of the Russian naval forces would be expanded, Putin said on Sunday in St. Petersburg at the central naval parade.
mz-web.de.376126.4: According to the Interfax agency, the Ministry of Defence also informed about successful tests of the Zircon hypersonic missile built for the navy.
mz-web.de.376126.5: The hypersonic weapons have a multiple of the speed of sound of around 343 metres per second.
mz-web.de.376126.6: They are considered weapons of the future.
mz-web.de.376126.7: Underwater tropedeo continues to be built
mz-web.de.376126.8: Construction will continue on the nuclear-equippable underwater torpedo Poseidon, it was said.
mz-web.de.376126.9: The planned sea drone is planned to destroy coastal targets.
mz-web.de.376126.10: The president, who himself also sailed in a military boat, said that this year alone 40 new ships would be put into service with the individual fleet units of the largest country in the world.
mz-web.de.376126.11: Russia has such a large coastal area as no other country in the world.
mz-web.de.376126.12: The navy has been protecting Russia reliably for 300 years, Putin said on the day celebrated by sailors nationwide.
mz-web.de.376126.13: The naval forces also celebrated Navy Day with parades in many other Russian coastal towns.
mz-web.de.376126.14: In Syria, where Russia is fighting alongside ruler Bashar al-Assad, the military demonstrated strength at an arms show in the Mediterranean port of Tartu.
mz-web.de.376126.16: A video published by the Ministry of Defence showed not only warships, including a submarine, but also combat helicopters and jets.
tt.com.149061.1: Hurricane "Hanna" reaches Texas: Help made more difficult because of corona
tt.com.149061.2: Washington - The first hurricane of this year's season over the Atlantic has made landfall in Texas.
tt.com.149061.3: Life-threatening floods, strong winds and heavy rainfall now threatened parts of the US state, the National Hurricane Center of the US climate agency NOAA announced during the night on Sunday (local time).
tt.com.149061.4: Governor Greg Abbott declared a state of emergency for many counties.
tt.com.149061.5: The coronavirus pandemic raging in Texas is making the work of aid workers more difficult, Abbott said, according to US media.
tt.com.149061.7: "Every hurricane is a tremendous challenge," Abbott said, according to the Houston Chronicle.
tt.com.149061.8: With regard to the cyclone in Texas, he added: "This challenge is complicated and exacerbated when you consider that it is sweeping through an area that is the most affected by COVID-19 in the state."
tt.com.149061.9: According to Johns Hopkins University, around 5,000 people have died in Texas alone as a result of the coronavirus pandemic.
tt.com.149061.10: Abbott called on people who had to leave their homes to be cautious.
tt.com.149061.11: They should not disregard practices "to which we have become accustomed," such as wearing masks, the governor said, according to CBS.
tt.com.149061.12: It was important that everyone kept their distance.
tt.com.149061.13: Therefore, hotel rooms were also provided in some places.
tt.com.149061.14: In addition, corona should be tested in emergency shelters.
tt.com.149061.15: Damage was initially reported only from the coastal town of Port Mansfield.
tt.com.149061.17: With wind speeds of up to 150 kilometers per hour, according to authorities, "Hanna" hit land on the island of Padre Island just off the Texas coast.
tt.com.149061.18: The tropical storm had previously been upgraded to the lowest level one hurricane.
tt.com.149061.19: For the coastal section from Port Mansfield to Sargent, a storm surge warning was initially issued and later withdrawn.
tt.com.149061.20: Authorities expected a weakening, while "Hanna" moved further inland and headed for northeastern Mexico.
tt.com.149061.22: In the Pacific, Hurricane "Douglas" was heading towards Hawaii during the night on Sunday with wind speeds of around 150 kilometres per hour.
tt.com.149061.23: The hurricane center, however, expected it to weaken further.
tt.com.149061.24: According to the forecast, it will be near Hawaii's largest islands on Sunday (local time) - then as a storm just below the hurricane threshold.
tt.com.149061.25: Over the Atlantic, NOAA expected an above-average hurricane season this year, according to a forecast from May.
tt.com.149061.26: From June to the end of November, up to ten hurricanes are expected, of which up to six could become very strong hurricanes, the agency had said.
tt.com.149061.27: On average, there are six hurricanes per year over the Atlantic, three of which develop into storms of great strength.
tt.com.149061.28: Given the available climate data and the higher water temperature in the Atlantic and the Caribbean, the probability of a normal season is only 30 percent, while a below-average season is only 10 percent, it was said at the time.
tt.com.149061.29: US President Donald Trump wrote via Twitter that his administration is closely monitoring the storms and is in contact with the affected states.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.1: Four goals denied: video assistant "punished" Sassuolo
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.2: Sassuolo's Filip Djuricic were deprived of two goals
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.3: Naples - Four goals scored, four goals denied: Sassuolo Calcio experienced a raven-black evening at the 0:2 (0:1) at the SSC Napoli in the Italian football league Serie A - and was really angry with the video assistant of the referee.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.4: "A festival of not given goals for Sassuolo.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.5: The VAR has never been so tough on a team," commented Corriere dello Sport.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.6: Hosts Naples had taken the lead through a goal from outside defender Elseid Hisaj in the 8th minute, with Filip Djuricic initially hailing the equaliser in the 32nd minute.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.7: The Video Assistant Referee (VAR) took the hit back because of an offside position.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.8: Five minutes later Djuricic shot the ball into the net again - again the VAR intervened.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.9: The goals of attacker Francesco Caputo (50th) and Domenico Berardi (61st) were also withdrawn by the refereeing team after being informed by the VAR.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.10: In the injury time Allan made the 2-0 final score for Naples and the bitter evening for Sassuolo perfect.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.11: "For Sassuolo, the VAR is worse than a radar trap on the road and punishes Sassuolo like no other team before.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.12: The new technology sets new records," writes the "Gazzetta dello Sport".
wn.de.700404.2: Munich (dpa) - The start of the hot preparation phase for the Champions League began for double winner FC Bayern with a setback.
wn.de.700404.3: After a short holiday and a few days of training, Hansi Flick has to think about how he can rebuild his successful defence after the injury of world champion Benjamin Pavard.
wn.de.700404.4: The Frenchman, who has the third most minutes behind captain Manuel Neuer and midfield boss Joshua Kimmich, suffered a ligament injury at the left foot root and threatens to be missing in decisive premier class duels.
wn.de.700404.5: In the Munich dirty weather, the right-back broke off a training game and was driven off the course with a golf kart.
wn.de.700404.6: How long the unrestricted regular player has to pause in the fight for the title is open.
wn.de.700404.7: An appearance in the second leg against Chelsea on 8 August should be difficult, the 24-year-old can hope for the final tournament starting on 12 August in Lisbon.
wn.de.700404.8: The Bavarians, however, do not want to be stopped by the mishap from training on Sunday.
wn.de.700404.9: In his personal triple formula, Flick mentioned the three attributes he wants to see from his stars on their way to Portugal's capital.
wn.de.700404.10: Quality, intensity and concentration are to be shown by his victorious title collectors in the ideally following 28 days until the royal class final on 23 August.
wn.de.700404.11: "We have mastered the mandatory tasks with championship and cup simply excellently.
wn.de.700404.12: Now it's time to create something special," said Flick.
wn.de.700404.13: Until the Munich team can concretely deal with the final tournament and previously a training camp in the Algarve, however, it is time for the round of 16 against Chelsea FC.
wn.de.700404.14: After the 3:0 in the first leg before the corona break, the Londoners should not become the Bayern nightmare again in the home arena as in the lost "final dahoam" in 2012.
wn.de.700404.15: "We have to go through the door first.
wn.de.700404.16: We want to win, create good conditions and build confidence with a good game," demanded Flick.
wn.de.700404.17: A test to get in the mood is scheduled for Friday against Olympique Marseille.
wn.de.700404.18: With a long speech, Flick had sworn his stars, who had 13 days of vacation after the double, to a unique August.
wn.de.700404.19: He welcomed 31 players to Säbener Straße, including the new players around noble purchase Leroy Sané, who met all new colleagues on the pitch for the first time after his move from Manchester City.
wn.de.700404.20: "Like all newcomers, Leroy has fitted in well," reported Flick.
wn.de.700404.21: But instead of talking about the new season, when Sané & Co. are no longer only allowed to train, Flick preferred to talk about the current title project of the German series champion.
wn.de.700404.22: After days of individual and small group training, team strength is now being trained for the Londoners, who, in contrast to the Flick ensemble, are in playing rhythm.
wn.de.700404.23: After that, the Munich team could face a quarter-final against FC Barcelona and Lionel Messi, in the semi-finals Real Madrid, Manchester City or Juventus Turin are possible opponents.
wn.de.700404.24: A way to the final in Lisbon "is not that easy," stressed the head coach, who can rely on the services of his new assistant Miroslav Klose in training from Tuesday.
wn.de.700404.25: World Cup record goalscorer Klose and Flick know about many a joint tournament preparation, which is particularly important in the 0 to 100 set-up.
wn.de.700404.26: With his current team, working is "a pleasure," praised Flick.
wn.de.700404.27: The "focus on winning" is an impressive characteristic of his team.
wn.de.700404.28: The tournament with nine teams was also ambitious on Sunday.
wn.de.700404.29: All of the top performers were there, including Thiago, who is willing to emigrate, and defender David Alaba, whose whereabouts are not assured beyond the royal class season.
salzburg.com.306641.1: Formula 1 needs a special rule to choose its world champion
salzburg.com.306641.2: Since it is not possible to drive on the required number of continents, the FIA has to improvise in order to award the world championship titles.
salzburg.com.306641.4: Race calendar is becoming more and more concrete
salzburg.com.306641.5: The racing calendar of the current Formula 1 season continues to take shape.
salzburg.com.306641.6: Three more race tracks were added to the ten confirmed Grand Prix so far during the week.
salzburg.com.306641.7: In October, races will be held at the Nürburgring in Germany and in the Portuguese city of Portimao.
salzburg.com.306641.8: On the first of November, Lewis Hamilton and Co. will fight for World Championship points at the traditional Italian race track in Imola.
salzburg.com.306641.9: This means that the 2020 race calendar currently comprises 13 races.
salzburg.com.306641.10: "We are pleased to continue to make great progress in finalizing our plans for the 2020 season," said Formula One boss Chase Carey.
salzburg.com.306641.11: A total of 15 to 18 races in the premier class of motorsport are to be completed in this extraordinary season.
salzburg.com.306641.12: Formula 1 wants to conclude its season in Asia.
salzburg.com.306641.13: The final race calendar is to be fixed and published in the coming weeks.
salzburg.com.306641.14: According to media reports, appearances in Vietnam and Malaysia could take place at the end of November before the officially targeted races in Bahrain and Abu Dhabi in December.
salzburg.com.306641.15: Regulations require races on three continents
salzburg.com.306641.16: However, Formula 1 regulations require at least races on three continents to be awarded the World Championship.
salzburg.com.306641.17: Even if, as currently planned, only two continents are driven, there is to be a world champion.
salzburg.com.306641.18: With the help of a special rule, the FIA wants to award the titles, citing "exceptional circumstances" due to the coronavirus pandemic.
salzburg.com.306641.19: The traditional start of the season in Australia in March had to be cancelled at short notice due to the impending coronavirus crisis.
salzburg.com.306641.20: A return to the continent this year is not an issue.
salzburg.com.306641.21: In addition, Formula 1 will not be a guest in America this year.
salzburg.com.306641.22: Cancellation met with criticism in Brazil
salzburg.com.306641.23: Due to the tense coronavirus situation, the races will not take place in Canada, the USA, Mexico and Brazil.
salzburg.com.306641.24: "We're looking forward to being with them again next season," Carey said.
salzburg.com.306641.25: The cancellation of the American races met with criticism, especially in Brazil: "The cancellation did not come as a surprise to us, but we cannot accept the reasons for it," said Tamas Rohonyi, promoter of the Grand Prix in Sao Paulo.
salzburg.com.306641.26: For example, the number of infections in the Sao Paulo area is significantly lower than in other regions of Brazil.
salzburg.com.306641.27: Furthermore, the concerns of some teams about not wanting to race in Brazil would not justify a rejection.
salzburg.com.306641.28: They are prepared for the required security measures.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.1: Greta Thunberg: Evil look against Donald Trump went around the world
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.2: Greta Thunberg spoke about her meeting with US President Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.3: Greta Thunberg was a guest on Stephen Colbert's well-known late night show and revealed in an interview what she had in mind when she met Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.4: Climate activist Greta Thunberg was a guest on a popular US latenight show via video.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.5: Among other things, she talked about her struggle against the powerful of the world.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.6: The teenager also talked about her famous "evil eye" when she met Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.7: New York City - Over the past two years, climate activist Greta Thunberg has attracted attention with her tireless commitment to the "Fridays For Future" movement.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.8: Now she spoke on a well-known late-night show about her plans for the future and her meeting with US President Donald Trump at the UN climate summit last year.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.9: Latenight host Stephen Colbert welcomed 17-year-old Thunberg to your show on Tuesday and conducted a lengthy interview with the Swede.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.10: She spoke not only about her fight against climate change, but also about her conflict with the world's powerful.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.11: "There are some things that surprised me," she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.12: "How far people go to steer the focus away from the climate crisis," she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.13: "Everything from organized hate campaigns to threats just because a group of children takes to the streets," she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.14: Heads of state and leading politicians who mock her on social media or even try to silence her find her "funny" because the reactions show her "because they have no other answer to it".
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.15: It became particularly interesting at the end of the interview when Greta Thunberg was approached about a well-known scene in which she cast a bitter look after US President Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.16: At the 2019 UN climate summit in New York, for which the actor sailed across the Atlantic, her expressive gaze was caught by the cameras and has since been seen by countless people on the Internet.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.17: The short clip resulted in a GIF, i.e. an animated image, which ultimately became one of the most frequently used images for Trump opponents.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.18: But what did the 17-year-old think about the US president at that moment?
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.19: To Stephen Colbert's relatively open question, she answered only briefly and dryly: "To be honest, I don't think that needs any further explanation."
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.20: The experienced satirist Colbert had probably not expected the quick-witted answer and briefly disappeared from the picture, laughing.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.21: With her "How dare you?" speech on the principles of climate protection, she was remembered by many at the climate conference.
morgenpost.de.276366.1: Ex-Dortmunder Immobile with three-pack for Lazio Rome
morgenpost.de.276366.2: Ciro Immobile is now on par with Bavaria's Robert Lewandowski in the race for Europe's Golden Shoe.
morgenpost.de.276366.3: Former Dortmunder Ciro Immobile still has the best chance of becoming top scorer in the Italian football championship.
morgenpost.de.276366.4: The former BVB pro contributed three goals in Lazio Rome's 5-1 (1-1) win at Hellas Verona, including two converted penalties in the injury times of both halves.
morgenpost.de.276366.5: This means that the 30-year-old from the fourth place in the table now has 34 goals of the season on his account - just as many were scored by Robert Lewandowski from Bayern Munich in the past Bundesliga season.
morgenpost.de.276366.6: In Italy Cristiano Ronaldo follows with 30 goals so far, the Portuguese superstar met Sampdoria Genoa with the leader in the evening.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.1: Fleetwood Mac co-founder Peter Green has died
mittelbayerische.de.307290.2: His life was like a roller coaster ride: After a rapid ascent with Fleetwood Mac, it went steeply downhill and then slowly uphill again.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.3: Now the blues rock guitarist Peter Green has died at the age of 73.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.4: Ingenious guitarist, drug junkie, cult follower: The co-founder of the band Fleetwood Mac, Peter Green, is dead.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.5: He died peacefully in his sleep at the age of 73, family members announced in an official statement on Saturday, a further statement would be announced for the next few days.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.6: Top musicians such as Peter Frampton praised Green as one of the best blues and rock guitarists.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.7: Mick Fleetwood spoke in an emotional reaction of a "monumental loss" for all former and current members of the band Fleetwood Mac.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.8: The drummer Fleetwood and the guitarist Green had founded the now legendary band in London in 1967, his dreamy instrumental hit "Albatross" is still unforgettable today.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.9: The musician's life ("The End Of The Game", "In The Skies") resembled a rollercoaster ride.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.10: With Fleetwood Mac Green experienced a rapid rise - the band celebrated their greatest successes but then without him.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.11: Among other things, there was a dispute because Green wanted to donate all the profits of the group to charity.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.12: He began to perform in wide robes and with a large crucifix.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.13: Psychological problems are also said to have played a role.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.14: Three years after its founding, Green left the band in 1970.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.16: The blues rock guitarist suffered from drug abuse and schizophrenia, as biographers reported.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.17: For a long time, Green was treated in psychiatry.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.18: For much of the 1970s, the musician disappeared from the scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.19: He is said to have lived temporarily on the street, worked as a cemetery gardener and spent some time in an Israeli kibbutz.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.20: Green was born in 1946 to a working-class Jewish family in Bethnal Green, London.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.21: From an early age, he was enthusiastic about US blues musicians such as B.B. King and Muddy Waters.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.22: At the age of eleven he learned the first guitar grips.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.23: At the age of 15, the teenager began playing guitar professionally and five years later got the chance to be on stage as lead guitarist for the instrumental band Peter B's Looners.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.24: Shortly afterwards, he was hired by the Bluesbreakers as a replacement for his idol Eric Clapton.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.25: In the midst of the blues boom, Green founded Fleetwood Mac in the summer of 1967 together with his Bluesbreakers colleagues Mick Fleetwood and John McVie.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.26: The song "Albatross" composed by Green gave the group their first number one hit in the winter of 1968/69 and catapulted them to the top of the British music scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.27: But the rapid rise soon showed its dark side: Green could not cope with the media hype, his experiments with the drug LSD became increasingly extreme.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.28: He later commented on life between music and addiction in an interview: "The worst thing that happened to me in life is the drugs - the best thing was to land a number one hit."
mittelbayerische.de.307290.29: Towards the end of the decade, Green was surprisingly successful in 1979 with an album inspired by religious themes.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.30: Meanwhile, Fleetwood Mac swam without him in a new formation on a wave of success.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.31: Their 1977 album "Rumours" sold more than 40 million copies worldwide.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.32: Despite various small solo successes, Green did not make a major comeback until he started again in 1996 with a group of friendly musicians.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.33: The British "Daily Telegraph" spoke at the time of a rock star who had returned to Earth.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.34: Free of drugs, Green released several albums with the Peter Green Splinter Group until the band broke up in 2004.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.35: For music experts, he was already a blues legend during his lifetime - and with his gentle sound one of the most influential guitarists of the past decades.
